${PWD}/_data/rules-testcases --siteUrl $npm_package_www_url","pretest":"npm run getData","serve":"gatsby serve","start":"npm run clean && npm run develop","test":"jest --coverage"},"version":"1.0.0","www":{"url":"https://act-rules.github.io"}}
